video_title: One person can't be everything for anyone
transcript:
and why do you think it is that most
marriages fail well I think most
marriages
fail oh this is going to be a good one
for a number of reasons one touches on
something that I said earlier which is
that marriage has become too many things
in my opinion marriage is fundamentally
a very humble institution it was not
designed to support being married to a
co-parent who's also your best friend
and also your passionate your mistress
or your passionate lover who's also your
therapist and it's etc etc and we have
this All or Nothing mentality where we
expect our partner to be
exceptional in all of these different
fields we want our partners to be too
many people and that has to do with the
fact that we don't really live in
communities anymore and we don't have an
extended kinship Network nearby
